explains: v. 增强，激励；巩固（地位），加强；改善，改进；给（座位）加软垫
n. 长枕，垫枕；承梁（用于支撑或减少摩擦）；托木；（削砖用的）凿刀
wordGroup: bolster plate 护索板；支承板；压床垫板

sentences.en: The country is free to adopt policies to bolster its economy.
sentences.cn: 这个国家可自由采取措施来巩固经济。

sentences.en: Since the former is most common among those inclined towards indifferent relationships, their predominance can bolster individuals' sense of self-worth.
sentences.cn: 由于前者在那些倾向于淡漠关系的人群中最为常见，它们的优势可以增强个体的自我价值感。

sentences.en: Falling interest rates may help to bolster up the economy.
sentences.cn: 利率下降可能有助于激活经济。
